body.name: LuLabboard Wireless Gaming Mouse, Rechargeable Wireless Computer Mouse, 7-Color LED Light, Ergonomic Mouse with 6 Silent Click Buttons, 3 Adjustable 2400 DPI Wireless Mouse for Laptop,PC,Mac, Black

features: ⚡️【𝐖𝐢𝐫𝐞𝐥𝐞𝐬𝐬 𝐟𝐫𝐞𝐞𝐝𝐨𝗺 & 𝐒𝐭𝐚𝐛𝗹𝐞 𝗖𝐨𝗻𝗻𝗲𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧】The wireless mouse connects with the 2.4G wireless Tech via the USB receiver, ensuring reliable connection with an increased working distance of up to 10m (33ft) and eliminates delays, dropouts, and interference. Plug and Play, no drivers needed.✅Mini USB receiver is stored back of the mouse.

⚡️【3 𝐃𝐏𝗜 𝐀𝐝j𝐮𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐛𝗹𝐞 & 𝐄𝐱𝐭𝐞𝐧𝗱𝐞𝗱 𝐁𝐚𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐲 𝐋𝐢𝗳𝐞】This rechargeable gaming mouse can be adjusted within 3 levels DPI (2400-1600-1200) 𝗯𝘆 𝗽𝗿𝗲𝘀𝘀𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗗𝗽𝗶 𝗕𝘂𝘁𝘁𝗼𝗻, you can freely choose your cursor speed. Besides, the wireless gaming mouse offers a battery life of up to 20 days ( lights on) and 25 days ( lights off), providing uninterrupted usage. It can also be used in wired mode while charging.

⚡️【𝐒𝐢𝐥𝐞𝐧𝐭 𝗖𝐥𝐢𝐜𝐤𝐬 & 𝗖𝐨𝐦𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐭𝐚𝐛𝗹𝐞 𝐆𝐫𝐢𝐩】PC gaming mice make no noise when clicking, no worry for disturbing others, suitable for public places such as office, library dormitory, cafe, etc. Ergonomic Design reduces the weight and makes the ergonomic mouse more flexible and easier to use for a long time without fatigue. Say goodbye to hand pain.

⚡️【𝐕𝗶𝐛𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐭 𝐁𝐚𝐜𝐤𝐥𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭】 The flowing rainbow backlight mode of the RGB gaming mouse creates a visually stunning environment and illuminates your workspace, adding a vibrant atmosphere. Perfect for nighttime use without any hassle. Light can be also turned off if you don't want it with the convenient switch under this computer mouse.
⚡️【𝐖𝐢𝗱𝗲 𝗖𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐛𝐢𝐥𝐢𝐭𝐲】Laptop mouse is tested for up to 5 million clicks, can be used for PC, Laptop, desktop, Computer, etc, and support Windows 7/8/10/XP//VISTA/MAC OS/Android/ios, etc.

💎【𝗤𝘂𝗮𝗹𝗶𝘁𝘆 𝗔𝘀𝘀𝘂𝗿𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗲, 𝗚𝗿𝗲𝗮𝘁 𝗚𝗶𝗳𝘁 𝗙𝗼𝗿 𝗕𝗲𝗹𝗼𝘃𝗲𝗱 𝗢𝗻𝗲🎁】A perfect gift for your Kids, Lover~ We promises 18 MONTHS AFTER-SALE SERVICE ( 𝗔 𝟏𝟎𝟎% 𝐫𝐞𝐟𝐮𝐧𝐝 𝐨𝐫 𝐫𝐞𝐩𝐥𝐚𝐜𝐞𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭). PLZ contact us if there exists any problem with the mouse. HOW TO CONTACT US➡️ 1. CLICK OUR STORE NAME "Lulabboard" 2. CLICK THE "Ask a question".

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Comfortable, Beautiful and Wireless Freedom. Tips : USB Receiver is Stored on the back of the Wireless Mouse.

Secure USB Receiver Storage The bottom of the mouse has: Light Button, USB receiver storage.Never worry about the USB RECEIVER falling off. Fit Any Grip Style Suitable for plam grip, glaw grip, fingertip grip. Coating with skin-like material, wireless gaming mouse becomes sweat-proof and non-slip, and helps reduce hand fatigue. Great for Gaming Extremely comfortable and precise experience for PC gaming. This wireless mouse work well with Windows 7/8/10/ Vista, Mac, etc.

Less Noise The buttons of mouse are optimally positioned for quick and noiseless. You don't need to worry disturbing others even at night. Enjoy your game or work time. 2.4G Wireless Connection Plug and Play. Avoid the hassle of cluttered wires. USB mouse with 6 Buttons controls all functions for Superior efficiency. Fast Type-C Charging Connect mouse to the computer with the included charging cable and the mouse will start charing.Note:The battery capacity is 500mAh and the battery life is related to personal usage habits, please charge in time~

Question & Answer Can I customize RGB? This gaming mouse has very beautiful breathing LED lights. You can turn off the backlight if you do not want, but please note that you cannot change the light modes. Where is the USB dongle? Please note that the USB receiver is located on the bottom of the mouse, which is very easy to access. How loud is this mouse? What type of noise do these make? It's a quiet mouse that will make no noise. You can safely use it in public places without worrying about disturbing others. How long is the charging cable？ The new version has extended the charging cable to 1.5m. When the USB receiver is plugged in, the mouse can also be used during charging. How long does the battery life last？ Our mouse is rechargeable, which can save you the trouble of changing the battery from time to time. It can last for 25-35 days without the light off, and 15-25 days with the light on. For a better experience, please use the included charging cable to charge the mouse in time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great wireless mouse
reviews.reviewText: Fun colors and easy to use. My 9 year old loves it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love the mouse
reviews.reviewText: I love the mouse and it’s very quiet, I just wish I didn’t see the red light from the bottom of the mouse come through to the top of the mouse and mess with the colors

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this for my son to use with his school laptop, he had me return it within a week because it was "laggy". Turned out, per his school IT department, that it gave the laptop a virus. Would 100% not recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good mouse for its value
reviews.reviewText: I like the way it feels. decent size mouse. Unfortunately my LED's dont function. I will be returning this item and ask for a replacement. (UPDATE), I returned the other mouse, and upon receiving my new mouse, the LED's still do not function....lost a star due to the fact that I believe no one at the production warehouse does any kind of quality inspection prior to releasing the products. (UPDATE2).....Upon further inspection, The switch underneath the mouse has 3 options. Not explained in the owners manual.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great gaming mouse
reviews.reviewText: My son has been begging me to get him a gaming mouse so I finally did. Great mouse love the charging method verse puting a battery in the mouse.It took him a minute to figure out how to connectit to the computer There was no instructions so he didn't know if it was charging are not. Then he didn't know how to get the lights to come on. After alot of thinking he got everything up and running.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Could be a life-saver?
reviews.reviewText: It's hard to review something you hope you'll never have to use so, in this case, I guess this is more of a preview.To me the hammer seems a little light. I think it would take a pretty powerful whack with this to break through toughened, laminated glass but the pointed ends are probably designed to deliver a pin-point blow in an emergency. There's also a, razor-sharp, shrouded blade intended to cut through a seat belt for easy release. As with most super-sharp blades, I would probably only trust this for single use at maximum sharpness but, if that avoids catastrophe, then it's probably served it's purpose and value.The hammer is a bright semi-fluorescent reddish orange for easier location in the dark. It does come supplied with a mounting cradle but I'm not sure I'd want to drill holes inside my car to fit that. Besides. I found it quite tight fitting which might hamper quick release? I'd be more inclined just to store the hammer loose in the glove compartment, side pocket or center console.I think it's certainly worth the modest cost to give yourself an extra chance in a tricky situation though, for your sake, I hope you'd never have to use it.
